title: 拿出最少数目的魔法豆 (Removing Minimum Number of Magic Beans)
content: 思路: // @Title: 拿出最少数目的魔法豆 (Removing Minimum Number of Magic Beans) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-01-18 10:27:40 // @Runtime: 37 ms // @Memory: 62.9 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public long minimumRemoval(int[] beans) { Arrays.sort(beans); //总数,可能达到上限，所以需要用long long s=0; for(int i:beans){ s=s+i; } long r=s; //如果以第i位为基准，那么剩余总数是beans[i]*（beans.length-i) for(int i=0;i<beans.length;i++){ r=Math.min(r,s-((long)beans[i]*(beans.length-i))); } return r; } }
